title: Ur CGPA
content: Was just wondering of what was your ISA and ESA marks in whichever sem and ur GPA? Can y'all pls link for comparison

comments.body: Comparing isn't going to help you. Just try to get better every sem, and only benchmark yourself with you last sem. That way you don't overwork yourself because you feel like you're not good enough. Best of luck kid

Also important to note that it gets progressively harder to score in each passing semester because of the exponentially increasing workload. 

It's not that difficult to give yourself a solid GPA in first year, and to a fair degree in second. Third is more about balancing that GPA. In fourth year since you barely have any courses, even if you get a 10 GPA it barely affects your CGPA so it's too late by then.
